My INFT3102 Assignment


How to run this application:

  • IF using VSCODE, open a new terminal by pressing Terminal > New Terminal
  • Next, make sure you are in the right directory in the terminal (ex. C:\Users\Moham\OneDrive\Desktop\WD\Demo11ty)
    • IF not in the right directory, type cd <Your Directory>
  • In the terminal, type npx @11ty/eleventy --serve

Maintaining the Eleventy/Handlebars Project

To keep this project running smoothly, here are some best practices to follow:

  • Organize Files: All relevent files are in src and are not to be removed. The dist file can be deleted as the build creates a new one every run. Edit the eleventy.config.js to further customize.
  • Update Dependencies Regularly: Use npm outdated to check for outdated packages, and npm update to keep everything current. This ensures compatibility and access to new features.
  • Run the Project Locally: To see changes live, run the project in development mode using npx @11ty/eleventy --serve. This helps catch any errors early on.

Reflection

The general layout was no different then njk. The only difference I notice was in the syntax. Also, had a hard time with pagination with handlebars since there are no for loops or while loops
